title: Minister felicitates Arshad on Gold Medal’s winning
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 9 (APP):Federal Minister for Maritime Affairs Qaiser Ahmad Sheikh on Friday extended congratulations to Pakistan Javelin ace Arshad Nadeem and the whole nation on winning the Gold Medal in the Paris Olympics.
In a felicitated message, the minister said that Arshad Nadeem is a pride of Pakistan, who broke the previous Olympic record in the javelin throw event at the Olympics.
He said, ”We are proud of these brave youth of the country and termed Arshad a real hero. May the Almighty keep
Pakistan prosperous and achieve success in every field.”
